div.p:
M[superscript]rs[/superscript]. E. Perceiving that an essential charac
teristic of a chimney sweeper - [underline]his brush[/underline]
was omitted in the drawing we sent
you now sends a sketch which you
must [deletion]show[/deletion] [insertion]give[/insertion] the engraver when
you put the little drawing in his
hands - It is merely to show that
the boy must have brush in hand
- the first drawing sent, is to be followed
in all other respects -
You will be so good to send
us a proof [deletion][unclear][/unclear][/deletion] [underline]for correction[/underline]
- Enclose to Sir William Gosset
Castle Dublin -
I am much obliged by your having sent for
me Sir James M[superscript]c[/superscript].Intosh's discourse on Meta
physics to North Audley Street
I have sent your message to the author
of Bertha and an answer will be
sent to you I am sure punctually
She does not reside with us, but
is a friend & near connexion for
whom we have the highest esteem &
greatest interest - I rejoice that Ber
tha has succeeded so well & that
you desire more by the same hand,
& [unclear][/unclear] young people - I wish your son
success in that line which I think
he is wise to pursue as it is likely to
last better than [insertion]the[/insertion] more fancy line of litera
ture that must be subject to the changes
of fashion politics &c - But as long
as people have children [deletion][unclear][/unclear][/deletion] and
any sense & any money they must
have books for them & the best will infallibly
make their way best [insertion]& last longer[/insertion] because [unclear]put[/unclear] to the
proof constantly
div.closer:
I am D[superscript]r[/superscript] Sir
Yours truly
Maria Edgeworth

postscript.p:
Be so good as to send the letter
enclosed by the Gen[superscript]l[/superscript]. Post the
day you receive this packet
